name: Sanskriti Samvardhan Mandal
briefDescription: Sanskriti Samvardhan Mandal is a village based voluntary organization est. with a view to educate and empower the deprived rural people. SSM is working for rural development through activities like Education, Health, Women & Child Welfare and Natural Resource Development.  SSM runs one of the largest residential schools in India imparting education to 4000 children. Till date, we have served more than one lakh needy people
